__TOC__

This is a list of setuid applications that need investigation. See the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-hardened/2007-October/000217.html|mailinglist post]]</nowiki> about this for more information.

See also the <nowiki>[[http://bazaar.launchpad.net/%7Eubuntu-bugcontrol/qa-regression-testing/master/annotate/head%3A/install/README.files_explained|install audit notes]]</nowiki>.
